info.title: Space Data Server
info.description: MVP Space Data Service based on the data standards at: SpaceDataStandards.org, version 0.0.2+1675110065585

get.description: Returns the OpenAPI 3.0 JSON API file.
Returns a list of all of the providers available on the node.
Returns the page limit for number of CID records.

Returns the latest Content Identifier for a provider by standard. If the query parameters `start` and `stop` are omitted, it will returnt the latest CID.  Rows returned are limited by `config.limits.database.totalRecords`
Returns a JSON Schema for the standard.

Returns data by standard, provider, and optionally the Content Identifier (CID).  The CID is created using a Flatbuffer of the returned data, regardless of the serialization selected.  If no CID is specified, the most recent CID is used.  The CID is always returned in the header "x-content-identifier".
Returns the JSON Schema document for a SpaceDataStandards.org standard.  Defaults to sending back all standards.
SQL used to generate the database structure for this server.

200.description: Successfully returns the raw SQL as a string.

get.description: Returns the Flatbuffer Interface Description Language (IDL) for the standard.

200.description: Successfully returns the raw IDL as a string.

post.description: Accepts a flatbuffer as a POST body, returns a JSON representation.  For debugging.

STANDARDS.description: List of SpaceDataStandards.org Standards Loaded into this node.
